page.title: 13MY FAVOURITE SPORTS
page.content: My favourite sports are tennis, swimming and football. I am quite lucky because I am able to play tennis on proper, and some of the newest courts. I took up tennis properly while we were on holiday in Spain. We were staying at a tennis coaching centre and I decided that I would like to try my hand at it, and I have been improving since then. I really enjoy swimming, especially breast stroke. I have my Scottish Swimmers Award and badges for 50m,100m,200m,400m,800m,& 1000m this is as far as we can swim at Primary school. We go every week in the Summer term with the school,but I go regularly all year with my parents. I started to play football when I got into P4,and was lucky to be substitute in Bells Tournament that year.I liked it so much that I've been playing ever since. We won the Shield again in June
